name: AMERICAN TRAFFIC SAFETY SERVICES ASSOCIATION
sampleDescriptions: Advocated for dedicated short range communication, 5.9 ghz spectrum and connected/automated vehicles, as part of the Safety Spectrum Coalition.
ATSSA advocated for a roadway safety-focused infrastructure package as well as increased transportation funding in appropriations.
ATSSA advocated for revenue increases for the Highway Trust Fund to be included in the infrastructure package in Congress.
ATSSA advocated for a roadway safety-focused infrastructure package as well as increased transportation funding in appropriations.
ATSSA advocated for increased transportation funding in the Transportation, Housing and Urban Development appropriations bill.
